Gordon Mohr (@Internet Archive) wrote:

> KFranks@... wrote:
> > ...
>
> >   - RedHat 2.4
>
> We've run into a variety of problems with Linux threads hanging on
> all but the latest "NPTL"-based threading libraries (associated with
> glibc 3.2.4 or later).

Here's a pointer to the section in the release notes that discusses the 
issue Gordon is referring to.  It may be of some help: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html#1_4_0_limitations

St.Ack
